bug.question: I'm small and crawl, and like to eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as an egg
🐛 I turn into a butterfly!
🌿 I like to munch on plants

bug.question: I buzz around flowers and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm yellow and black
🍯 I live in a hive
🐝 I collect nectar

bug.question: I hop and jump and make a 'ribbit' sound, and like to eat bugs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am green.
💧 I live near water.
👅 I have a long sticky tongue.

bug.question: I have spots and I am red and black, and I am good luck! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round
🍎 I am the color of an apple
⚫ I have small circles on my back

bug.question: I can fly and have colorful wings, and I used to be a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I drink nectar from flowers
🌈 I am beautiful and fluttery
🐛 I change a lot during my life

bug.question: I march in lines and carry crumbs, and I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small
💪 I am very strong for my size
🏠 I live underground in a big group

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs
🕷️ I live in the corners of houses and gardens
🔎 I can be scary but I help catch other bugs

bug.question: I jump really high and make a chirping sound in the grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am green and long
🌱 I eat plants
🦗 I make a noise in the summer

bug.question: I light up at night and twinkle in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I glow
💡 I use light to attract a partner
🌙 I only come out at night

bug.question: I live in the ground and help plants grow strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I am long and wiggly
🍂 I eat dirt and leaves
🪴 I help make soil healthy

food.question: I am yellow, you peel me, monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine!
🐒 I am a favorite snack of monkeys.
💪 I give you lots of energy.

food.question: I am small and round, often green or red, and I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow high up!
🍎 Snow White really liked me!
🦷 An _____ a day keeps the doctor away!

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Rabbits like me for lunch.
👁️ I am good for your eyes.
✨ You can find me in the garden!

food.question: I am white and cold, and I love to be eaten on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am kept in the freezer.
🍨 I come in many flavors!
👅 You use a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am round and red, and you slice me on pizza. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I often go on top of your favorite pizza!
🍅 I am a fruit, but people think I am a vegetable.
🪴 You can grow me in your garden.

food.question: I am small and green. You can eat me with dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I look like a tiny tree.
💪 I'm good for you!
🍽️ I am a common side dish.

food.question: I am yellow and sweet, and bees make me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 Bees work hard to make me!
🍯 Winnie the Pooh loves me!
🥄 You can stir me into your tea.

food.question: I am white and you drink me, cows give me to us. What am I?

hints.text: 🐮 Cows give me.
🥛 I am good for your bones.
🥣 You can pour me on cereal.

food.question: I am brown and hard, and squirrels like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels bury me!
🌰 I grow on trees.
🍂 You find me in the fall.

food.question: I am made of dough, and I’m baked in the oven, you eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be white or brown!
🔥 I get hot in the oven.
🥪 People make sandwiches with me.
